alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and southeastern Putnam Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 503 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crescent City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
